text: San Basilio (Santu 'Asìli 'e mònti) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,238 people lived there. Its area is 44.63 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 415 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: San Basilio
